name: Puzzling Beats
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN WINDOWS IF POSSIBLE. WEB VERSION STILL WORKS EXCEPT FOR BEAT DETECTION. (ALTERNATIVELY, GO FOR LOWEST SCORE!), OR CHILL. 

ALSO DON'T USE CHROME.

Made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Theme (Joined Together).

Join the puzzles together, Tetris-style, to the beat of the music. More points the more you're on beat!

Instructions:

  • Increase the multiplier by being on beat. Lost multiplier if not on beat.
  • Join the entire row or column for a Tetris-like effect!
  • Pull lever when you run out of pieces.
  • Chill with music!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Mouse: Click and Drag Pieces

Spacebar: Turn Pieces

Escape: Toggle Menu
